author: Duplicate Ryan Kanarek
post_text: August 17, 2015 at 7:14 PM#1New shows in v3.1 arrange the Shapers encoders as 1-4a, 1-4b. For those who would prefer the old arrangement (1a/b, 2a/b, 3a/b, 4a/b), you can use the attached macro to rearrange.Made in v3.1.1.1FilesArrange Shapers.xml1.56 kB – 38 Downloads
title: Re-arrange Shapers Encoders
